  labels = {["inline"]}>
<code>MsgStr</code> is the message to be reported to the frontend.

This class does not copy <code>MsgStr</code>, therefore the reference must be valid for the whole life time of the Diagnostic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h/#l00387">387</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
